snippet: We used “magisterial” more than 70 times in the last year, and some version of “underscore” has appeared 127 times in just the last month. A reminder about words we love too much.
abstract: We used “magisterial” more than 70 times in the last year, and some version of “underscore” has appeared 127 times in just the last month. A reminder about words we love too much.
